onyomiExamples.meaning: high monk (esp. one of correct conduct who acts as a role model for his pupils), high priest, initiate (esp. as a formal rank in Tendai and Shingon), monk who conducts religious services

kunyomiExamples.meaning: nashi (Pyrus pyrifolia, esp. var. culta), Japanese pear, Asian pear, sand pear, apple pear
nashiji (lacquering technique using gold or silver powder or flakes)
Harbin pear (Pyrus ussuriensis var. hondoensis), Ussurian pear, Chinese pear
